description.narrative: The project will promote comprehensive management of the forest resources in the Tarapoto – Yurimaguas Corridor,and the Puerto Maldonado – Iñapari Corridor and Amarakaeri Communal Reserve. The capabilities of native communities, PUB and local governments will be strengthened through training programs, the development of projects and the preparation of local development plans (such as life plans) so that they can manage their resources. In addition, the project will strenghten the forest governance at the national level.
